info.name: Stylish / userstyles.org Dark Theme
info.description:
A theme to make the Stylish website look nice and dark!

If you would like to check out my channel, it can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/frokfrdk
info.additionalInfo: VERSION 5.0 - 17 October 2022 - Updated theme to match new site style - Updated scrollbars to look more modern - Brightened the uninstall theme button - Fixed the suggested styles when a theme is installed - The Stylish logo on the footer is now the correct colour - Fixed text for unsuccessful searches - Fixed the ... between page numbers - Updated theme image (Finally, long overdue) VERSION 4.0 - 2 June 2022 - THE SIDEBAR ICONS FINALLY MATCH THE TEXT!!!!! - Updated report and uninstall icons to match text VERSION 3.0 - 6 January 2022 - Added support for Android Themes - Added support for the info page - Added support for contact page - Added support for help page - Fixed customisation options - Fixed text in the forms - Brightened customise button VERSION 2.0 - 3 January 2022 Happy new year! - Fixed incompatibility caused by new website layout - Fixed customise button on the install page - Added support for new comments section VERSION 1.1 - 10 December 2021 - Fixed archived theme text - Fixed logo bug VERSION 1.0 - 8 December 2021 - Released theme (Known bugs, I do not know how to change the colour of the sidebar icons, android theme creator not fully supported)
